document.full_text: in nine appearances this year, mariano rivera has yet to allow a run, and has converted each of his seven save opportunities. the fact that he is still doing it now, at age 41, is unheard of.
document.title: at 41, star closer hasn't lost his edge
lines_and_colors: in nine appearances this year, mariano rivera has yet to allow a run, and has converted each of his seven save opportunities. the fact that he is still doing it now, at age 41, is unheard of.
